code: var createProductPositionSystem=function createProductPositionSystem(){return{update:function update(delta,_ref,_ref2){var products=_ref.products,productInfos=_ref.productInfos,whiteSmokeList=_ref.whiteSmokeList;var height=_ref2.height;for(var i=products.length-1;i>=0;i--){products[i].y+=delta*products[i].speedY;products[i].speedY+=productInfos.accY*delta;if(products[i].y>height*0.96){whiteSmokeList.push({stateTime:0,x:products[i].x,y:products[i].y});products.splice(i,1);}}}};};export default createProductPositionSystem;
